column2: "Na sɔfopanyin Eliasib nye no nuanom asɔfo no soɛree
column3: na wosii abobow a wɔfrɛ no Nguantsen Kuropon no; hɔn na wɔyɛɛ no krɔnkrɔn
column4: na wosisii no mbobow no; mekyerɛ wɔyɛɛ no krɔnkrɔn dze kodur Hamea abantsentsen no ho
column5: dze kodur Hananel abantsentsen no ho."

column2: "Na ne nkyɛnmu na Jeriko mbarimba sii. Na hɔn nkyɛnmu na Imri ba Zakur sii."
"Na Enam Abotsen no
column3: Hasenaa mba na wosii; hɔn na wɔdze no mpuna gui
column4: na wosisii no mbobow

column2: "Na hɔn nkyɛnmu na Meremot
column4: Hakoz ba no
column5: miamiaa mu. Na hɔn nkyɛnmu na Mesullam
column8: miamiaa mu. Na hɔn nkyɛnmu na Zadok

column2: "Na hɔn nkyɛnmu na Tekoafo miamiaa mu; naaso hɔn ekunyin no ammfa hɔn ho ammbɛhyɛ hɔn wura n'edwuma no mu bi."
"Na abotsen dadaw no
column3: Pasea ba Joiada na Besodeia ba Mesullam na womiamiaa mu
column4: hɔn na wɔdze no mpuna gui

column2: "Na hɔn nkyɛnmu Gibeonnyi Melatia
column4: Gibeon na Mizpa mbarimba a wodzi wɔ esuegya noho ambrado n'ahengua no."

column2: "Na ne nkyɛnmu na Harhaia sikadwimfo no mu bi no ba Uziel miamiaa mu. Na ne nkyɛnmu
column4: nduforaforafo no mu bi no miamiaa mu
column5: na wɔyɛɛ Jerusalɛm dzendzen araa dze kodur fasu tɛtɛɛtɛr no do."

column2: "Na hɔn nkyɛnmu na Refaia
column4: Jerusalɛm amantɔw fa do hwɛfo no

column2: "Na hɔn nkyɛnmu na Harumaf ne ba Jedaia
column4: mekyerɛ noara ne fie tsentsendo no a. Na ne nkyɛnmu na Hasabineia ba Hatus miamiaa mu."

column2: "Harim ba Malkija
column4: miamiaa sin bi so

column2: "Na ne nkyɛnmu na Halohesh ba Sallum
column3: Jerusalɛm amantɔw fa do hwɛfo no
column4: miamiaa mu

column2: "Bɔnsa Kuropon no
column4: na Zanoa na womiamiaa mu; hɔn na wɔtowee
column8: na wɔtoow fasu no mu basafa ahaenum dze kodur Sumina Kuropon no ho."

column2: "Na sumina kuropon no
column4: Bɛt-hakerem amantɔw do hwɛfo no
column5: na omiamiaa mu; ɔno na ɔtowee

column2: "Na Nsunyiwa Kuropon no
column4: Mizpa amantɔw do hwɛfo no
column5: na omiamiaa mu; ɔno na ɔtowee
column9: na ɔtoow Sela Nsutaae ho fasu so wɔ ɔhen no ture no ho araa dze kodur ntwer a osian fi David kurow mu no ho."

column2: "Ɔno n'ekyir na Azbuk ba Nehemia
column3: Bɛt-zur ɔmantɔw fa do hwɛfo no
column4: miamiaa mu
column5: dze kodur David asamandan no ne tsentsendo bea no do
column6: na nsutaae a wɔyɛe no ho
column7: na mbarimba akatakyi no hɔn fi no ho."

column2: "Ɔno n'ekyir na Levifo no
column3: Bani ba Rehum miamiaa mu. Ne nkyɛnmu na Hasabia
column4: Keila ɔmantɔw fa do hwɛfo no miamiaa mu dze maa ne mantɔw."

column2: "Ɔno n'ekyir na hɔn nuanom
column4: Keila ɔmantɔw fa do hwɛfo no

column2: "Na ne nkyɛnmu na Jesua ba Ezer
column4: miamiaa sin bi so mu
column5: wɔ fasu no ne mbekyewee no mu akodzedan no mfowee no ne tsentsendo."

column2: "Ɔno n'ekyir na Zabai ba Baruk miamiaa sin bi so mu enyiberdo
column3: fi fasu no ne mbekyewee no mu
column4: dze kodu sɔfopanyin Eliasib ne fi abow ho."

column2: "Ɔno n'ekyir na Meremot
column4: Hakoz ba no
column6: fi Eliasib ne fi abow ho araa dze kodu Eliasib ne fi tsir."

column2: "Na ɔno n'ekyir na asɔfo no
column3: Ɔbɔn no mu mbarimba no bɔtoaa do miamiaa mu."

column2: "Hɔn ekyir na Benjamin na Hasub miamiaa mu wɔ hɔn fi ne tsentsendo. Hɔn ekyir na Azaria
column4: Anania ba no
column5: miamiaa mu wɔ nankasa ne fi nkyɛn."

column2: "Ɔno n'ekyir na Henadad ba Binnui miamiaa sin bi so mu
column3: fi Azaria fi ho dze kodu fasu no ne mbekyewee no mu
column4: na kutuw no ho."

column2: "Uzai ba Palal na omiamiaa fasu no ne mbekyewee no
column3: na abantsentsen a ɔworɔw fi n'etsifi fi no a ɔwɔ aweɔmfo abangua ho no ne tsentsendo. Ɔno n'ekyir na Paros ba Pedaia miamiaa mu."

column2: "(Afei Asɔrfi mu asomfo no tsenaa Ofel do
column3: mbrɛ ɔdze kɔ Nsu Kuropon ne tsentsendo wɔ boka
column4: na abantsentsen a ɔworɔw no n'afamu.)"

column2: "Ɔno n'ekyir na Tekoafo no miamiaa sin bi so mu
column3: wɔ abantsentsen kɛse a ɔworɔw no ne tsentsendo
column4: na ɔdze kodu Ofel ho fasu no ho."

column2: "Ofi Mpɔnkɔ Kuropon ano na asɔfo no miamiaa mu
column3: obiara wɔ nankasa ne fi no ne tsentsendo."

column2: "Hɔn ekyir na Immer ba Zadok miamiaa mu wɔ nankasa ne fi no ne tsentsendo. Na ɔno n'ekyir na Sekania ba Semaia
column4: miamiaa mu."

column2: "Ɔno n'ekyir na Selemia ba Hanania
column4: Zalaf ba no a otsia esia no
column5: miamiaa sin bi so mu. Ɔno n'ekyir na Berekia ba Mesullam
column6: miamiaa mu wɔ ne pia ne tsentsendo."

column2: "Ɔno n'ekyir na Malkija
column3: sikadwimfo no mu baako no miamiaa mu kodur Netinfo na eguadzifo no fi wɔ Hamifikad kuropon ne tsentsendo
column4: na ɔdze kodu kutuw do afowee no."

column2: "Na kutuw do afowee no na abobow a wɔfrɛ no Nguantsen Kuropon no ntamu na sikadwimfo na eguadzifo no miamiaa mu."
